column5: Hi all,   Getting the boat cleaned out after a long winter has never been so fun.
Get dad,Jack. LOL  You guys have so much fun Simon.

Get dad,Jack. LOL  You guys have so much fun Simon. LOL…he had the glint in his eye to get me on more than one occasion, had to lay down the law though, don't want him randomly aiming pressure washers at things….he'd send the cat flying a couple hundred yards with that thing!
You KNOW you're a fisherman when your roof has scuppers in it!
